Title: Accelerate innovation with AI: Introducing the Product Change Management agent template
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
The Product Change Management agent template is an AI-powered solution that transforms how manufacturers manage the process of change across equipment, products, processes, and more. Built on Microsoft Copilot Studio, the agent automates workflows and connects systems, helping teams cut approval times from weeks to days, reduce errors, and bring innovations to market faster.

Learn more:- https://msft.it/6059teFM1
